thread.title: Neka C
thread.title_full: Elevate Styles reviewed by Neka C

author: Neka C
title: Neka C
text: The shipping was really fast, it only took 3 days and I'm across the country. This hair is incredibly soft for synthetic hair, I compared it side by side with some kinky curly human hair that I had, and it was hard to tell the difference. I haven't installed it yet, but will be sure to update my review once I do.
